events.message: I purchased a jacket last week and I want to return it because it does not fit properly.
The issue has been identified as a refund request based on the customer's return inquiry.
The case has been assigned to customer support agent Sarah M. for further assistance.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to return the jacket due to sizing issues. How can I help you today?
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so we can process your refund accordingly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket is too small and I would like to get a refund or exchange if possible.
Thank you for the details. We can offer you a full refund or send an exchange in a larger size. Please let us know your preference.
I would prefer a refund, please. Thank you for the quick response and help.
Your refund has been initiated and should reflect in your account within 5-7 business days. We appreciate your patience.
Just following up to ensure you received your refund as expected. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist with.
Since your refund is complete and there are no further questions, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey to hear about your support experience. Your feedback is important to us.
